titleStmt.title: A pro[gno]stication for the y[ear MDLX]VII [for the] meridia:- & [pole] artick of ...
titleStmt.author: Coxe, Francis, fl. 1560.

notesStmt.note: An almanack and prognostication by F. Coxe was entered to Allde in 1566-1567 and is possibly this item. Cf. STC.
Title and publication date from STC. Imprint from colophon.
An uncut fragment, possibly a proofsheet, printed on verso of: A godly ballad declaring by the Scriptures the plagues that haue insued whordome. London, J. Allde, 1566. (STC 14046).
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
